price: 3. Waxaanu soo dejinnay (Qur’aanka) habeen barakaysan3.Waxaanu nahay kuwa diga (soo dira Rusul oo soo dejiya Kutub).
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
footnotes: 3. Waa Laylatul Qaddarka ee loo soo waxyooday Nabiga s.c.w. Qur’aanka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
